name: LogicTestTwo
0:
”Alexa open logic test two”
”true”
”explain the answer to question four”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: logic test two
des: Logic Test Two is a five question test where the user decides whether the reasoning in each syllogism is true or false. The user may choose either an easy, medium, or hard skill level. After completing the test, the skill tells the user which questions they got right, the average time to answer the questions, and allows the user to hear an explanation for each answer. No data is saved after the skill is closed. At any time, the user may use the following phrases: "repeat" (the last thing said), "retake the test," or "who wrote this."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
